source_setting.source: select persistent_inventor_id, attribution_status, name_first, name_last, male_flag, num_patents, num_assignees, lastknown_location_id, lastknown_city, lastknown_state, lastknown_country, lastknown_latitude, lastknown_longitude, first_seen_date, last_seen_date, years_active from elastic_staging.inventors order by persistent_inventor_id limit {limit} offset {offset};

inventor_years.source: select patent_year, num_patents , a.persistent_inventor_id as inventor_id from elastic_staging.inventor_years ay join (select inventor_id, persistent_inventor_id from elastic_staging.inventors order by persistent_inventor_id limit {limit} offset {offset}) a on a.inventor_id = ay.inventor_id
